attributes.action: Abolish Inheritance Tax to attract investment and strengthen the UK economy
attributes.additional_details:
IHT raises only about 1% of UK revenue yet discourages saving, investment and family business growth.

Removing it would attract overseas capital, encourage long-term investment and help retain wealth and talent in Britain.

Several successful economies such as Hong Kong and Australia have no IHT, showing that low-tax environments can draw international funds and strengthen fiscal stability.

Abolishing IHT would make the UK more open, competitive and globally attractive.
attributes.background: The Government should abolish IHT and replace it with a fairer, growth-focused system that encourages saving, entrepreneurship and investment. Removing IHT would strengthen the UK economy, attract global capital and support families and small businesses.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/738649
